opportunities.rationale: Acme Corp is scaling their data analytics capabilities and hiring multiple data scientists. MATLAB's advanced analytics and visualization capabilities would accelerate their modeling workflows and integrate well with their existing Python stack.
talking_points: MATLAB integrates seamlessly with Python workflows via the Python Engine API
Built-in tools for data visualization eliminate need for multiple toolchains
Live Editor enables reproducible research and collaboration
GPU computing support for ML model training at scale
risks: Existing Python-centric culture may resist new tools

opportunities.rationale: Job postings indicate embedded systems development work. Simulink would provide model-based design capabilities for their control systems engineering team, reducing development time and improving quality.
talking_points: Model-based design reduces embedded development time by 30-50%
Automatic code generation for production deployment
risks: May have existing modeling tools in use

variants.markdown:
Based on my analysis of Acme Corp's requirements and our product catalog matches, here are the sales opportunities:

```json
{
  "opportunities": [
    {
      "product_name": "MATLAB",
      "rationale": "Acme Corp is scaling their data analytics capabilities and hiring multiple data scientists. MATLAB's advanced analytics and visualization capabilities would accelerate their modeling workflows and integrate well with their existing Python stack.",
      "target_persona": "VP of Data Science",
      "talking_points": [
        "MATLAB integrates seamlessly with Python workflows via the Python Engine API",
        "Built-in tools for data visualization eliminate need for multiple toolchains",
        "Live Editor enables reproducible research and collaboration",
        "GPU computing support for ML model training at scale"
      ],
      "estimated_value": "$150K ARR",
      "risks": ["Existing Python-centric culture may resist new tools", "Budget cycle timing unclear"],
      "confidence": "high",
      "confidence_score": 0.85
    },
    {
      "product_name": "Simulink",
      "rationale": "Job postings indicate embedded systems development work. Simulink would provide model-based design capabilities for their control systems engineering team, reducing development time and improving quality.",
      "target_persona": "Director of Embedded Systems",
      "talking_points": [
        "Model-based design reduces embedded development time by 30-50%",
        "Automatic code generation for production deployment",
        "Hardware-in-the-loop testing capabilities",
        "Integration with existing CI/CD pipelines"
      ],
      "estimated_value": "$200K ARR",
      "risks": ["May have existing modeling tools in use", "Learning curve for engineering team"],
      "confidence": "medium",
      "confidence_score": 0.68
    }
  ]
}
```

Both opportunities are well-supported by the research data.
